themes.name: I Speak Colors
themes.description: Practice French color vocabulary and usage.

quizzes.name: Writing and Reading Colors Test 1
quizzes.description: Read and write key phrases related to i speak colors.

quizzes.name: Writing and Reading Conversation Colors Test 2
quizzes.description: Use i speak colors vocabulary in everyday conversation contexts.

quizzes.name: Listening Colors Test 3
quizzes.description: Improve your listening skills with i speak colors phrases and expressions.

quizzes.name: Listening Conversation Colors Test 4
quizzes.description: Practice listening in realistic i speak colors dialogues.

quizzes.name: Writing and Reading & Listening Colors Test 5
quizzes.description: Mix of writing, reading and listening skills for i speak colors situations.
